# Parameter cell to define default values for notebook input parameters
pipeline_trigger_time = "2022-01-01 00:00:00"
data_source_id = ""
database_schema = ""

# Define relevant entities
entities = ["Customer", "Address", "CustomerAddress"]

# Extract year, month and day from pipeline trigger time
year, month, day, hour, minute, second = extract_datetime_attributes(pipeline_trigger_time)

# Create empty dictionaries for input datasets and schemas
df_dict = {}
schema_dict = {}

# Path to workspace data lake
data_platform_path = "abfss://data-platform@omweuadls001.dfs.core.windows.net"

# Add directories
folder_path = f"{data_platform_path}/bronze/{data_source_id}/{database_schema}/{year}/{month}/{day}"

# Define schema for Customer entity, no loops for readability
schema_dict["Customer"] = StructType([\
    StructField("CustomerID", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("NameStyle", BooleanType(), True),\
    StructField("Title", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("FirstName", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("MiddleName", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("LastName", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("Suffix", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("CompanyName", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("SalesPerson", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("EmailAddress", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("Phone", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("PasswordHash", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("PasswordSalt", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("rowguid", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("ModifiedDate", DateType(), True)])

# Define schema for Address entity, no loops for readability
schema_dict["Address"] = StructType([\
    StructField("AddressID", IntegerType(), False),\
    StructField("AddressLine1", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("AddressLine2", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("City", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("StateProvince", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("CountryRegion", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("PostalCode", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("rowguid", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("ModifiedDate", DateType(), True)])

# Define schema for CustomerAddress entity, no loops for readability
schema_dict["CustomerAddress"] = StructType([\
    StructField("CustomerID", IntegerType(), False),\
    StructField("AddressID", IntegerType(), False),\
    StructField("AddressType", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("rowguid", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("ModifiedDate", DateType(), True)])

for entity in entities:
    df_dict[entity] = read_dataframe(
        f'{folder_path}/{entity}_{year}{month:02d}{day:02d}-{hour:02d}{minute:02d}{second:02d}.csv',
        header='true',
        schema=schema_dict[entity])

for entity in entities:
    write_dataframe(
        df_dict[entity],
        f"{data_platform_path}/silver/{data_source_id}/{database_schema}/{entity}/{year}/{month}/{day}",
        partitions=1)
